constraints: Completeness ("full"): The response provides a thorough answer for normal use, covering all major aspects without needing every micro-detail.
Method ("order"): The response applies abstract structural reasoning such as hierarchy, dominance, or recurrence.
Form ("bullets"): The response presents the main answer as concise bullet points only, avoiding long paragraphs.
